page.title: 07DANCING YEARS STUDIO 2
page.content: Mrs. B.Brown, Mrs.D.Kibby and Mrs C.Perkins help.They will take children from 2 to school age.It is from 9.30 to 12.00. They have milk and biscuits which comes out of their 80p which they pay each day. They have play dough,lego,Wendy house,books,jigsaws, drawings,models and cars.The ladies who help, read them a story last thing each day. {People who help. Mrs L.Reindrop helps Mrs B. Brown because she is a qualified dancer as well.Mrs. J.Carrit is the secretary.Mrs. S. Dawson and Mrs. S.Adams are the dress makers and wardrobe mistresses. The Dancing Years Studio is held in the Old School in Benington.The school is now closed and the children come to our school in Butterwick.
